title: 【3.11.0.2更新】引擎升级麻烦多，作者劳累玩家心累。
author: Sakura小樱花
txt_content:
引擎升级麻烦多，作者劳累玩家心累。


大家好这里是小樱花=-=
带来最新Unturned资讯~


3.11.0.2更新内容~
公告-Nelson Sexton

哈喽【标准开头XD】

如果你对正在测试的Unturned感兴趣，你可以打开你的Steam游戏库右键点击Unturned，选择属性，找到“测试”栏，输入代码“OPERATIONMAPLELEAF”体验测试版的Unturned哟~
这个补丁不能解决所有的因为游戏引擎从Unity4到Unity5的升级而引发的问题，但接下来的几天我希望它能顺利的工作下去，给我挤出时间来发现更多的问题并且想出修复它们的办法。

添加：
添加异步物品图标生成器创意工坊可查看更新日志

改进：
改善了地面，使其覆盖草改善了Steamworks和游戏脚本的分离


调整：
使创意工坊内容暂时不加载，以此确保提交的BUG都是原版游戏的


修复：
修复客户端上车辆的日志文档修复编辑器移除刷子的问题修复偏离正确位置的文档文字修复电磁炮狙击镜的问题修复物品不加载图标的问题修复退出后车辆原地转动的问题修复驾驶时会透过僵尸的问题（撞不到僵尸修复车辆的质量中心修复当车辆在地面上时的探测问题

作者的话：然而作者这次并不想说话，可能是因为太累了。升级游戏引擎造成的问题实在太多太毁三观=-=




原文如下：

3.11.0.2 Update Notes 
23 JUNE         - NELSON SEXTON 
Hello!   If you're interested in testing out this upcoming update head on over to the Preview branch! You can gain access by right clicking on Unturned in your Steam library, selecting properties, navigating to the Betas tab and entering the secret passcode“OPERATIONMAPLELEAF". 
This patch does not resolve all the issues due to the recent engine upgrade from Unity 4 to Unity 5, but over the next several days I'll hopefully get it working much more smoothly as I learn what's causing problems and how to fix them. 
Additions:
 Added async item icon generation. 
 Added uploading/updating documentation to the workshop page. 
Improvements:
 Improved floors to cover grass.
 Improved separation of steamworks and game scripts. 
Tweaks:
 Tweaked workshop content to not load TEMPORARILY so that all bug reports are about the vanilla game. 
Fixes:
 Fixed vehicle log spam on client.
 Fixed editor remove brush.
 Fixed local area text off-center.
 Fixed shadowstalker scope.
 Fixed item icons not loading.
 Fixed vehicle to roll after exit.
 Fixed driving through zombies.
 Fixed vehicle center of mass.
 Fixed detecting when vehicle is grounded.
Thanks for reading!
